speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0209/2007 ) by Marie Panayotopoulous-Cassiotou, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on a regulatory framework for measures enabling young women in the European Union to combine family life with a period of studies ( 2007/2276(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0209/2007 ) by Marie Panayotopoulous-Cassiotou, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on a regulatory framework for measures enabling young women in the European Union to combine family life with a period of studies ( 2007/2276(INI) ).
